title: Group: Erase Faneuil from halls name because he was a slave trader
content: Boston Herald, by Marie Szaniszlo Posted By: John c- Sat, 02 31 2018 08:31:06 GMT Clergy members and other activists are calling on Boston officials to rename Faneuil Hall because a portion of the money used to fund the so'called Cradle of Liberty came, ironically, from the profits of its namesakes slave trade.
